General.Name: Shihlin Paper Corp
General.Description: Shihlin Paper Corporation produces and sells paper-related products. The company provides cards for use as playing and game cards; color cards for use in folders and art cards; black boards for use in speakers, as well as frame and album boards; and non-coated boards that are used in shoe boxes and environmental cartons. It also provides duplex boards with white back for use in tag cards and packaging containers; duplex boards with gray back for use in shoe and tissue paper boxes, liner boards, and packaging containers; and chip boards for gift-wrapped boxes and book binding applications. In addition, the company sells wet wipes, facial masks, skin care products, and toiletries; and leases assets. Shihlin Paper Corporation was founded in 1918 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
